column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had a wonderful time here
column2: the service is excellent and the patio/outdoor seating is wonderful! We had two types of sangria
column3: one was a fruit flavor and the other was red wine. I preferred the red wine variety as it was stronger tasting. All the food was very good
column4: we had a lot of different dishes
column5: if you are having trouble figuring out what to get just keep an eye on the servers and see what is coming out.
